casebody.data:
Edward P. SWIERSZCZ, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. ESSO SHIPPING COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 179, Docket 23285. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Feb. 11, 1955. Decided Feb. 11, 1955. Silas Blake Axtell, New York City (Martin G. Stein, Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for plaintiff-appellant. Matthew L. Danahar, New York City, Kirlin, Campbell & Keating, New York City, for defendant-appellee.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, HINCKS, Circuit Judge, and SMITH, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
